tasks.title: Setup Project Architecture
tasks.description: Create the basic structure for RuidMap with React + Tauri setup, including component organization and build configuration.

tasks.title: Implement ASCII Art Banner
tasks.description: Design and implement the animated ASCII art banner with typing effects and sparkle animations using Framer Motion.

tasks.title: Build Task Management System
tasks.description: Create the core task CRUD operations with status tracking (todo/in-progress/done) and priority levels.

tasks.title: Add Theme Support
tasks.description: Implement light/dark/custom theme switching with persistent storage and smooth transitions.

tasks.title: Create Kanban Board Layout
tasks.description: Design and implement the three-column kanban layout with drag-and-drop functionality for task organization.

tasks.title: Add Keyboard Shortcuts
tasks.description: Implement keyboard shortcuts: Enter (add task), Del (delete task), Space (toggle status) for improved productivity.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance
tasks.description: Profile and optimize the application for smooth animations and fast task operations, especially with large task lists.
